name: Stock Balance with Selling and Cost Prices
query:
WITH
stock_ledger_entry_qty AS (
	SELECT
		item_code,
		SUM(actual_qty) AS actual_qty
	FROM
		`tabStock Ledger Entry`
	WHERE
		is_cancelled = 0
	AND
		posting_date <= %(to_date)s
	GROUP BY
		item_code
	HAVING
		SUM(actual_qty) > 0
),
stock_ledger_entry_rate AS (
	SELECT
		item_code,
		SUM(stock_value_difference) / SUM(actual_qty) AS valuation_rate
	FROM
		`tabStock Ledger Entry`
	WHERE
		is_cancelled = 0
	AND
		posting_date <= %(to_date)s
	GROUP BY
		item_code
	HAVING
		SUM(actual_qty) > 0
),
item_price AS (
	SELECT
		item_code,
		price_list_rate
	FROM
		`tabItem Price`
	WHERE
		selling = 1
	AND
		price_list IN (
			SELECT
				value
			FROM
				`tabSingles`
			WHERE
				doctype = 'Selling Settings'
			AND
				field = 'selling_price_list'
		)
),
item AS (
    SELECT i.name, i.item_name, i.brand, i.is_stock_item
    FROM `tabItem` i
    LEFT JOIN `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle ON i.name = sle.item_code
    WHERE is_cancelled = 0
    GROUP BY i.name
)

SELECT
	item.name AS item_code,
	item.item_name,
	item.brand,
	stock_ledger_entry_qty.actual_qty,
	item_price.price_list_rate,
	stock_ledger_entry_rate.valuation_rate
FROM
	item
INNER JOIN
	stock_ledger_entry_qty
ON
	item.name = stock_ledger_entry_qty.item_code
LEFT JOIN
	stock_ledger_entry_rate
ON
	item.name = stock_ledger_entry_rate.item_code
LEFT JOIN
    item_price
ON
    item.name = item_price.item_code
WHERE
	item.is_stock_item = 1
AND
	stock_ledger_entry_qty.actual_qty > 0
ORDER BY
    item.brand
report_name: Stock Balance with Selling and Cost Prices
